column3: I think for Linux we could also enable Qt GUI builds if we build against the Trusty's Qt libraries instead of depends.\n@cfields what is the status on bringing back Qt tests?\n

> non-cache qt depends build

It was already cached, but travis could no longer retrieve the cache because I changed an environment variable. (https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/caching/#Caches-and-build-matrices)
